definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Shown below are specific features of edge-to-edge holographic CD's.
sentences.chinese: 下面介绍边到边全息图像光盘的具体特征。

sentences.english: The cat under the table is Tama.
sentences.chinese: 桌子下面的那只猫叫塔玛。

sentences.english: Suffice it to say that the following responses of some umbelliferous plants have been observed .
sentences.chinese: 下面仅就已观察到的几种伞形科植物的反应予以说明。

sentences.english: Your lifejacket is located under your seat or beneath your central arm rest.
sentences.chinese: 你的救生衣装在座位下或者中央扶手下面。

sentences.english: Below, you can see the result with each Anti-aliased method.
sentences.chinese: 下面，你可以看到每个反走样方法的结果。

sentences.english: The rest of the story is what she told me happened.
sentences.chinese: 下面的故事是她告诉我的那天所发生的事情。

sentences.english: The carpenter working on the rafter passed his axe down to his mate below.
sentences.chinese: 在椽子上干活的木匠将斧子传给下面的伙伴。

sentences.english: Consider the following two versions of a method, which end up doing the same thing. The version in Listing 2 uses cached field IDs
sentences.chinese: 考虑下面两个版本的方法，它们的作用是相同的。

sentences.english: This method is shown in the following listing.
sentences.chinese: 这种方法如下面的清单所示。

sentences.english: A charter is a mask; the lie lurks beneath it.
sentences.chinese: 宪章是个假面具，盖在那下面的是谎话。

sentences.english: Listen to the interview with Mr. Malcolm Lang Land and answer the following questions.
sentences.chinese: 听下面的对马克姆朗兰德的彩旗，回答下列问题。

sentences.english: But below are the six basic elements you hope to include in your strategy.
sentences.chinese: 但是下面六个基本要素你或许希望包括在你的策略里。

sentences.english: Documenting and defending these decisions depends on the communication skills discussed below.
sentences.chinese: 证明和维护这些决策依赖于下面讨论的交流技能。

sentences.english: Now I'd like to brief you on the 106th Canton Fair.
sentences.chinese: 下面我向大家介绍本届广交会的主要情况。

sentences.english: They should combine the comprehensive land using situation to develop the two types of residences, tog…
sentences.chinese: 这两种类型各具优劣，下面我们将二者进行对比分析。

sentences.english: The specifications of the files are listed below and the file names should match the activity name.
sentences.chinese: 这些文件的规范在下面列示，文件名必须匹配活动名。

definition: editor or creator of online content (diminutive term, often used to refer to oneself: I, me, this writer)
to take a look at/to examine/to survey/(coll.) pretty soon
(modal particle indicating suggestion or surmise)/...right?/...OK?/...I presume.
bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)/to puff (on a pipe etc)/(onom.) bang/abbr. for 貼吧|贴吧[tie1 ba1]
(used after a verb) give it a go/to do (sth for a bit to give it a try)/one time/once/in a while/all of a sudden/all at once

particle indicating that a previously asked question is to be applied to the preceding word ("What about ...?", "And ...?")/particle for inquiring about location ("Where is ...?")/particle signaling a pause, to emphasize the preceding words and allow the listener time to take them on board ("ok?", "are you with me?")/(at the end of a declarative sentence) particle indicating continuation of a state or action/particle indicating strong affirmation
we or us (including both the speaker and the person(s) spoken to)/(dialect) I or me/(dialect) (in a coaxing or familiar way) you/also pr. [za2 men5]
that level or lower/that amount or less/the following
